Pornic Harbour
Open 24/7
A nice old marina
Quai Leray, 1 Rue du Môle, 44210 Pornic \n Open daily and 24 hours a day, however, it is recommended to visit it at daytime
Pornic Castle
Not open to the public
Situated in the port of Pornic, the castle has long been a symbol of the town.
Place du Château, 44210 Pornic \n The castle is privately owned and not open to the public.
Faïencerie
Open Tue-Fri, 8am-5pm

The faiencerie offers hand drawing bowls since 1947 in Pornic. It is a good place to discover this art and the history of the city. Perfect for a family tour, everybody can leave with his own named bowl !
Rue de la Faïencerie, 44210 Pornic \n Open from Tuesday to Friday and from 8am to 5pm it is strongly recommended to book your tour in advance
PiVerre Workshop
Open Tue-Sat, 8am-5pm
PiVerre workshop is the best place to discover the glass blower\'s knowledge. More of discover the history af this art, you could try it and leave with your creation !
15 Bis Rue de la Haute Musse, 44770 La Plaine-sur-Mer \n Open from Tuesday to Saturday and from 8am to 5pm
Aquacenter
Open daily, 8am-9pm
The Aquacenter is perfect for a rainy day. Instead of swimming in the ocean, you may enjoy the large swimming pool, the jacuzzi and the sauna (with free tea !).
Complexe sportif du Val Saint-Martin, 44210 Pornic \n Open daily from 8am to 9 pm
Pornic Aventure
Open daily, 8am-9pm

Pornic Aventure is a treetop-park located in the Val St-Martin, 7 minutes drive away from the old harbour. Ziplines, climbing wall, monkey bridges and Tarzan jump will pleased everyone. The Pornic Aventure situation between trees and lake is a perfect heaven of peace.
Chemin des trois croix, 44210 Pornic \n Open daily from 8am to 9 pm
Val Saint Martin
Open daily 24/7
Val St-Martin Lake is a protected place between wild hills. If you are a runner, a fisher man or a nature-lover
Le Val Saint-Martin 44210 Pornic \n Open daily and 24 hours a day
La Fraiseraie
Open daily, 8am-11pm
La Fraiseraie is the oldest place in Pornic to buy delicious ice cream in front of the fraiseraie and the old harbour. It is the perfect place for a nice break !
Pl. du Petit Nice, 44210 Pornic \n Open daily, from 8am to 11pm
La Villa Noë
Open daily, 12pm-11pm
La Villa Noë is the best place to eat sea-food in front of the beach. A large choice of fresh sea-food is available each day. Let’s try it !
Plage de la Noeveillard, 44210 Pornic \n Open daily, from 12am to 11pm
Casino\'s Restaurant
Open daily, 10am-2am
The Casino’s restaurant offers a great value menu to enjoy in front of the old harbour. Most of all, there is often music bands playing at dinner time. A delight place for both stomach and ears !
50 Quai Leray, 44210 Pornic \n Open daily, from 10am to 2am
La Casa d\'Hernesto
Open daily, 11am-11pm
La Casa d’Hernesto is a little piece of Spain in Pornic’s city center. Tapas, sangria and Spanish music in front of the sea, a perfect mix for a perfect rest.
Nouveau Port Noëveillard, 44210 Pornic \n Open daily, from 11am to 11pm
Crescendo Cafeteria
Open daily, 11am-11pm
The Crescendo Cafétéria in Leclerc Mall is a good place for families or for having a quick meal after shopping. With the largest choice of meals in Pornic and the best value, you should try it once !
C/C Leclerc Zone des Terres jarries, 44210 Pornic \n Open daily, from 11am to 11pm
Beau Soleil
wi-fi, TV, mini bar, balcony, port view
In the heart of old harbour, the Hôtel Beau Soleil is a nice and comfortable place. The hotel is situated 8 minutes walk away from the train station and 15 minutes walk from the beach.
70 Quai Leray, 44210 Pornic \n Services : wi-fi, TV, mini bar, balcony, port view
Aliance Pornic Resort
wi-fi, TV, mini bar, locked-self, Alliance Pornic cosmetics, ocean view
Aliance Pornic Resort Hôtel Thalasso & Spa is a four stars hotel with a wonderful ocean view. With the spa, the swimming pool and the private beach, it is a heaven of peace.
Plage de la Source, 44210 Pornic \n Services : wi-fi, TV, mini bar, locked-self, Alliance Pornic cosmetics, ocean view
Les Volets Bleus
wi-fi, TV, kitchen, dishwasher, washing machine, living-room, BBQ
Les Volets Bleus is a bed and breakfast located in a house from the 19st century. The B&B is situated 3 minutes walk away from the train station and 6 minutes walk away from the old port.
2 Rue Mondésir, 44210 Pornic \n Services : wi-fi, TV, kitchen, dishwasher, washing machine, living-room, BBQ
Lili Rose
Open Mon-Sat, 10am-7pm
Lili Rose Decoration offers a good choice of French home decoration.
1 Rue du Traité d\'Amsterdam, 44210 Pornic \n Open on Monday to Saturday, from 10am to 7pm
Conserverie Belle Illoise
Open Mon-Sat, 10am-7pm
Conserverie La Belle Illoise is an essential stop point to bring back home with you some specialities from Pornic like sardines can.
58 Rue des Sables, 44210 Pornic \n Open on Monday to Saturday, from 10am to 7pm
Comptoir de la Mer
Open Mon-Sat, 10am-7pm
Comptoir de la Mer is a shop specialized in ocean items : decoration for home, clothes for the beach and the city, everything for fishing and for pleasure sailing.
4 Rue du Traité de Paris, 44210 Pornic \n Open on Monday to Saturday, from 10am to 7pm
